metadata.title: Tutorials - OpenAI API
metadata.description: Explore resources, tutorials, API docs, and dynamic examples to get the most out of OpenAI's developer platform.

text:
[](https://platform.openai.com/docs/tutorials/tutorials)

## [Tutorials](https://platform.openai.com/docs/tutorials/tutorials)

Get started with the OpenAI API by building real AI apps step by step.

[

Website Q&A with Embeddings

Learn how to build an AI that can answer questions about your website.



](https://platform.openai.com/docs/tutorials/web-qa-embeddings)[

Meeting minutes transcription with Whisper

Learn how to create an automated meeting minutes generator with Whisper and GPT-4.



](https://platform.openai.com/docs/tutorials/meeting-minutes)[

Coming soon

Learn how to build and deploy an AI chat bot that understands multiple knowledge bases.



](https://platform.openai.com/docs/tutorials/)

* * *

Looking for more ideas? Check out our [Examples gallery](https://platform.openai.com/examples) or the [OpenAI Cookbook](https://cookbook.openai.com/) on GitHub.
